tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legal_agreements (
    agreement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    agreement_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    parties JSONB NOT NULL,
    executed_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    contract_address VARCHAR(42)
)

CREATE TABLE legal_agreements (
    agreement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    agreement_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    agreement_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    party1 VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    party2 VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    validity_period TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
    contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    contract_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    agreement_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES legal_agreements(agreement_id),
    execution_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE legal_agreements (
    agreement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agreement_name VARCHAR(255),
    party_one VARCHAR(255),
    party_two VARCHAR(255),
    agreement_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    agreement_id INT,
    execution_date DATE,
    is_executed BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (agreement_id) REFERENCES legal_agreements(agreement_id)
);

CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_code TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    is_active BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE agreements (
    agreement_id INT,
    agreement_name VARCHAR(255),
    agreement_text TEXT,
    signing_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE parties (
    party_id INT,
    party_name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE signatures (
    signature_id INT,
    agreement_id INT,
    party_id INT,
    signature_date DATE,
    signature_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE executions (
    execution_id INT,
    agreement_id INT,
    smart_contract_id INT,
    execution_date DATE,
    execution_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
    smart_contract_id INT,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_text TEXT,
    creation_date DATE,
    creator_party_id INT
);
